name: TARJECTORIES 2 (LD40)
description:
TARJECTORIES 2 is the sequel to TARJECTORIES. I originally made TARJECTORIES for LD38, and spent the weekend of LD40 improving  it and adapting it to the LD40 theme, and am submitting it as a jam entry. 

The theme for LD40  was The more you have, the worse it is. So in keeping with the theme, I expanded the original game, which had only 2 planets per level max, and increased that to up to 5 planets per level.  

Destroy all targets to clear a level and advance. Don't accidentally hit yourself, or it's game over!

Controls

  • Left|Right or A|D to adjust your gun's elevation
  • Up|Down or W|S to adjust your gun's power
  • [space]|[enter] to fire your gun
